events.title: Class 1: What is Data Science & AI
events.description: Introduction to data science and AI fundamentals. Learn what these fields are about and why they matter. Led by Dr. Weiqi Zhang.
events.audience: Beginners, students interested in data science

events.title: Class 2: Python Crash Course Part 1
events.description: Get started with Python programming. Learn basic syntax, variables, and data types essential for data science.

events.title: Class 3: Python Crash Course Part 2
events.description: Continue Python fundamentals. Learn about loops, functions, and working with libraries.

events.title: Class 4: Data Cleaning
events.description: Learn essential techniques for cleaning and preparing data for analysis. Handle missing values, outliers, and data formatting.

events.title: Class 5: Data Visualization
events.description: Create compelling visualizations to communicate insights. Learn matplotlib, seaborn, and visualization best practices.

events.title: Class 6: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
events.description: Learn systematic approaches to exploring datasets. Discover patterns, anomalies, and insights through statistical analysis.
events.audience: Students ready to analyze real datasets

events.title: Class 7: Intro to Modeling
events.description: Introduction to machine learning concepts. Understand supervised vs unsupervised learning and model evaluation basics.

events.title: Class 8: Modeling in Practice
events.description: Apply machine learning models to real problems. Hands-on practice with scikit-learn and model training workflows.

events.title: Class 9: Final Project Work Session
events.description: Dedicated time to work on your final project. Get help from instructors and collaborate with peers.

events.title: Class 10: Final Presentations
events.description: Present your data science projects to the community. Celebrate your learning journey and receive feedback.

gallery.title: Class 1 Workshop - AI Development Discussion
gallery.description: Screenshot from Class 1 virtual workshop discussing data availability and hardware advancements driving AI development.

gallery.title: Class 1 Workshop - Group Session
gallery.description: Virtual meeting screenshot showing participants engaged in the first data science class with Dr. Weiqi Zhang.

gallery.title: Data Science Course Curriculum
gallery.description: 10-lesson free course curriculum covering Python, data cleaning, visualization, EDA, and machine learning fundamentals.
